items.summary: Explore AI in education through LEGO! Discover how students can design learning logic using SPIKE Prime sets, building robots that adapt and learn without new hardware.
LEGO Education updates on the retirement of SPIKE sets, promising long-term reliability. New Computer Science & AI sets await real classroom testing before reviews are published.
Celebrate the imaginative world of robotics with RoboCamp! Teachers integrate 3D printing and laser cutting with LEGO SPIKE Prime to go beyond the basics and unleash creativity.
Introduce young students to coding with Cosmic Battle! Make sci-fi starfighter robots and let them duel, bringing fun and unpredictability to your STEM classroom.
3D Printing in robotics: a creative boon or logistical bane? Explore the potential of 3D printing in SPIKE Prime robotics classes and share your thoughts on overcoming challenges.
Dive into classic game development with RoboCamp! Kids build their own Snake and Arkanoid using SPIKE Prime and Python, learning game mechanics and coding along the way.
Explore mechanical principles with the Flying Bird project using SPIKE Prime, mBot 2, and laser cutting. Easily construct dynamic models that illustrate mechanics in action.
Visualize centrifugal force with the Carousel project using SPIKE Prime, mBot 2, and laser cutting. Students learn physics through engaging, hands-on experiences.
Unleash creativity in classrooms with 8 new robot lessons, including cranes and carousels. Utilize laser cutting and SPIKE Prime or mBot 2 sets for these exciting projects.
Bring robotics dreams to life with new lesson plans! Build cranes, carousels, and more using SPIKE Prime, mBot 2, and laser cutting for a unique educational experience.
Coding classics: Build Snake and Arkanoid with SPIKE Prime! This Python course sparks a love for tech, guiding kids in programming robots and exploring game development.
Use SPIKE Prime and a 3D-printed propeller to create an anemometer that measures wind speed. This lesson blends STEM learning, engineering, and real-world data collection.
Introduce students to coding with Cosmic Battle! Let starfighters duel in a fun-filled lesson that combines sci-fi creativity with STEM skills through chance and coding.
Teaching physics with the Carousel model: Explore centrifugal force hands-on using SPIKE Prime or mBot 2, enhanced by precision laser-cut elements.
Build mechanical marvels like the Flying Bird using SPIKE Prime, mBot 2, and laser cutters. Inspire creativity and understanding of mechanical design in classrooms.
